name: Send an Email interview invitation when a Trello card is moved to a specific list
description:
Use this template to automatically send an Email message with an interview invitation to a job applicant once a Trello Card is moved to a specific list.

The template works with the following [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shruEPIPJZVXf2tAY) and its setup assumes the applicant's email address is in the (Trello) card's description.
